data.title: Discuss the theme of the poem Poor Relations
data.meta_description: [Solved] Discuss the theme of the poem Poor Relations
data.text: Directions Read and analyze the poem Delow Then answer the following questions A Filipino Dream - My Spirit I have a Filipino dream Stop the war and wild loud of scream I have a dream not for myself Not a selfish man who thinks of himself I have a Filipino dream Cease the pain of a poor at the stream Three stars are united as one My dreams and love are bounded as one 1 What are the rhyming words (Box the rhyming words) 2 What is the rhyme scheme 3 How many stanzas does the poem have 4 How many lines per stanza does the poem have 5 What is the theme of the poem
